messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR BEN WALLACE
messages.content: Crack Down on Anti-Social Behaviour, Stand up for Local Communities, Reward Aspiration

messages.title: 5 MORE YEARS OF GORDON BROWN OR CHANGE WITH THE CONSERVATIVES
messages.content: In just a few weeks we will have the most important exercise of our generation.

messages.title: GETTING BRITAIN WORKING
messages.content: We are the party of aspiration and opportunity.

messages.title: BACKING THE NHS
messages.content: David Cameron has said, 'I'll cut the deficit, not the NHS'.

messages.title: SUPPORTING FAMILIES
messages.content: Families are the foundation of a strong society.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring that anti-social behaviour orders are applied in the courts.
Oppose Traveller sites not imposed upon local communities without their consent.
Support hard work and those trying to own and improve their homes and community.
